name: Survival Cars . Free Blocky Craft Car Racing Games For Kids 3D
name_original: Survival Cars . Free Blocky Craft Car Racing Games For Kids 3D
description:
◉◉ Survival Cars . Blocky Racing ◉◉

◉◉ Survive in an illegal race where the cars take to the streets of NY! ◉◉

If you like Minecraft game we are sure you will like our pixel cars racing game!

Something happens in New York! The best illegal cars racing drivers have gathered in Manhattan.

People crowd around Manhattan streets to look upon the most exciting and dizzying pixel cars race.

Choose your favorite among the available cars and prepare in the best possible way both wheels and engine.

Dodge as many cars as you can an avoid drive over other cars to keep your high-speed and not be removed!

Are you ready to know New York like the back of your hands? Discover the surprises the game offers!

Follow us on our social media links and find the release of our future cars racing games and about other thematics.

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Give us a like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
